TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpSessionState extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpSessionState Implements ICollection
public ref class HttpSessionState sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HttpSessionState = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供工作階段狀態值以及工作階段層級設定和存留期 (Lifetime) 管理方法的存取權。

span.span: Provides access to session-state values as well as session-level settings and lifetime management methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供工作階段狀態管理，可讓您儲存多個要求相關聯的唯一的瀏覽器工作階段的資訊。ASP.NET provides session-state management to enable you to store information associated with a unique browser session across multiple requests. 您可以儲存參考的索引鍵的名稱或數值索引值的集合。You can store a collection of values referenced by a key name or by numerical index. 存取工作階段值和功能是可透過類別，這是可透過存取屬性的目前，或有屬性。Access to session values and functionality is available using the class, which is accessible through the property of the current , or the property of the . 工作階段資料與特定的瀏覽器工作階段使用的唯一識別碼有關聯的。Session data is associated with a specific browser session using a unique identifier. 根據預設，此識別碼會儲存在不會過期工作階段 cookie 在瀏覽器，但您也可以設定您的應用程式儲存在 URL 中的工作階段識別項，藉由設定`cookieless`屬性設定為`true`或項目中應用程式組態。By default, this identifier is stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser, but you can also configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL by setting the `cookieless` attribute to `true` or in the element of your application configuration. 您可以判斷是否 cookie 支援瀏覽器所指定的值為 ASP.NET針對`cookieless`屬性。You can have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are supported by the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 您也可以讓 ASP.NET 決定是否啟用 cookie 的瀏覽器所指定的值是針對`cookieless`屬性。You can also have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are enabled for the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 如果支援 cookie 時已指定，或已啟用時指定，則工作階段識別碼會儲存在 cookie 中; 否則為將會在 URL 中儲存的工作階段識別碼。If cookies are supported when is specified, or enabled when is specified, then the session identifier will be stored in a cookie; otherwise the session identifier will be stored in the URL. 在第一個要求時啟動工作階段和工作階段值會保存，只要瀏覽器會發出新的要求中指定的分鐘數之前屬性傳遞。Sessions are started during the first request and session values will persist as long as a new request is made by the browser before the number of minutes specified in the property pass. 新的工作階段開始時，則工作階段就會引發事件。When a new session begins, the session event is raised. 若要執行任何額外的工作，在工作階段，例如設定預設工作階段值開始，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to perform any additional work at the start of a session, such as setting default session values. 當工作階段逾時，呼叫方法時，或 ASP.NET 應用程式關閉時，工作階段就會引發事件。When a session times out, the method is called, or the ASP.NET application is shut down, the session event is raised. 您可以使用這個事件執行任何必要的清除作業。You can use this event to perform any necessary cleanup. 就會引發事件時，才將工作階段狀態`mode`設定為。The event is raised only when the session state `mode` is set to . 若要改善效能，使用 cookie 的工作階段未配置工作階段存放區之前的資料實際上存放在物件。To improve performance, sessions that use cookies do not allocate session storage until data is actually stored in the object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For more information, see the property. 工作階段狀態不會保存跨 ASP.NET 應用程式界限。Session state does not persist across ASP.NET application boundaries. 如果瀏覽器巡覽至另一個應用程式時，工作階段資訊不適用於新的應用程式。If a browser navigates to another application, the session information is not available to the new application. 根據預設，工作階段值會儲存在 Web 伺服器上，記憶體中。Session values are stored in memory on the Web server, by default. 您也可以儲存在 SQL Server 資料庫、 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器或自訂伺服器的工作階段值。You can also store session values in a SQL Server database, an ASP.NET state server, or a custom server. 這可讓您保留工作階段值，在其中的 ASP.NET 或 IIS 程序或 ASP.NET 應用程式重新啟動的情況下，並在 Web 伺服陣列中的所有伺服器之間提供工作階段值。This enables you to preserve session values in cases where the ASP.NET or IIS process or the ASP.NET application restarts and to make session values available across all the servers in a Web farm. 此行為透過設定來設定`mode`屬性設為有效應用程式組態項目中的值。This behavior is configured by setting the `mode` attribute to a valid value in the element of your application configuration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4). 工作階段狀態的替代項目包含應用程式狀態 (請參閱屬性) 和 ASP.NET 快取 (請參閱命名空間)，可存取的 ASP.NET 應用程式的所有使用者的存放區變數; ASP.NET 設定檔 (請參閱命名空間)，其中保存而不會過期的資料存放區中的使用者值使用逾時;ASP.NET ，其中保存控制項中的值;;屬性，以及 HTML 表單上的欄位都是從 HTTP`POST`使用集合。Alternatives to session state include application state (see the property) and the ASP.NET cache (see the namespace), which store variables that can be accessed by all users of an ASP.NET application; the ASP.NET profile (see the namespace), which persists user values in a data store without expiring them using a time-out; ASP.NET , which persist control values in the ; ; the property; and fields on an HTML form that are available from an HTTP `POST` using the collection. 如需工作階段狀態和其他狀態管理替代項目之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理建議](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af79fa0d-4bc8-47a6-9915-d8e355bfb732)。For more details on the differences between session state and other state-management alternatives, see [ASP.NET State Management Recommendations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af79fa0d-4bc8-47a6-9915-d8e355bfb732). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定，並擷取工作階段狀態的值。The following code example sets and retrieves values from session state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpSessionState#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/session2cs.aspx#30)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpSessionState#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/session2vb.aspx#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 取消目前工作階段。

span.span: Cancels the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次方法呼叫、 目前工作階段已不再有效，而且可以啟動新的工作階段。Once the method is called, the current session is no longer valid and a new session can be started. 會導致會引發事件。 causes the event to be raised. 新在下一個要求就會引發事件。A new event will be raised on the next request. 已放棄或已過期的工作階段的工作階段識別碼會回收預設。Session identifiers for abandoned or expired sessions are recycled by default. 亦即，如果包含工作階段識別碼已過期或已放棄的工作階段提出要求時，新的工作階段就會啟動使用相同的工作階段識別項。That is, if a request is made that includes the session identifier for an expired or abandoned session, a new session is started using the same session identifier. 您可以藉由設定停用此`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性的組態項目`true`。You can disable this by setting `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute of the configuration element to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作階段識別碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/146ca206-d151-4f2e-a548-bcca05ccf0cb)。For more information, see [Session Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/146ca206-d151-4f2e-a548-bcca05ccf0cb). 支援事件時，才屬性設定為。The event is supported only when the property is set to .

span.span: Adds a new item to the session-state collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`參數會參考現有的工作階段狀態項目、 現有的項目會覆寫具有指定`value`。If the `name` parameter refers to an existing session state item, the existing item is overwritten with the specified `value`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將值儲存在工作階段狀態中，使用方法。The following example shows how to store values in session state by using the method. 它也會示範如何使用工作階段狀態中移除值方法。It also shows how to remove values in session state by using the method. A控制項用來在網頁上顯示內容的工作階段狀態。A control is used to display the contents session state on the Web page. 方法用來逐一查看工作階段狀態集合，並填入控制項。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CodePage : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作階段的字元集識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

value.span: 目前工作階段的字元集識別項。

span.span: The character-set identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字元集 （字碼頁） 用來解譯多位元組字元資料，判斷字元值，並排序次序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multi-byte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 字碼頁設定僅適用於多位元組字元資料，而無法 Unicode 字元資料。Code-page settings apply only to multi-byte character data, not to Unicode character data. 這屬性會提供與舊版 ASP 只有相容性。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 網頁，使用屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead.

A控制項用來在網頁上顯示工作階段狀態的內容。A control is used to display the contents of session state on the Web page. 方法用來逐一查看工作階段狀態集合，並填入控制項。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCookieless As Boolean
public: property bool IsCookieless { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出工作階段 ID 是否內嵌於 URL 或儲存於 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the session ID is embedded in the URL or stored in an HTTP cookie.

value.span: 如果工作階段內嵌於 URL，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the session is embedded in the URL; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 與每個瀏覽器，請以唯一地識別工作階段。ASP.NET identifies sessions uniquely with each browser. 根據預設，在瀏覽器中不會過期工作階段 cookie 中儲存工作階段的唯一識別碼。By default, the unique identifier for a session is stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser. 您可以指定的工作階段識別碼不會儲存在 cookie 中設定`cookieless`屬性設定為`true`組態項目中。You can specify that session identifiers not be stored in a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute to `true` in the configuration element. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善您的應用程式的安全性，您的應用程式應該允許的使用者登出，此時它應該呼叫方法。To improve the security of your application, your application should allow users to log out, at which point it should call the method. 這會減少潛在的不必要的來源，在 URL 中使用的唯一識別碼，以擷取儲存在使用者工作階段的私用資料。This reduces the potential for an unwanted source using the unique identifier in the URL to retrieve private data stored in the session for a user. ASP.NET 會維持無 cookie 工作階段狀態，藉由自動將唯一的工作階段識別碼插入頁面的 URL。ASP.NET maintains cookieless session state by automatically inserting a unique session ID into the page's URL. 例如，ASP.NET 包含唯一的工作階段識別碼 lit3py55t21z5v55vlm25s55 已修改下列 URL:For example, the following URL has been modified by ASP.NET to include the unique session ID lit3py55t21z5v55vlm25s55: ``` http://www.example.com/(S(4danlfat035muve4g0mvgfrr))/orderform.aspx ``` ASP.NET 會修改所有要求的頁面中包含內嵌連結中的工作階段識別碼值之前傳送至瀏覽器的每個頁面的連結。ASP.NET modifies the links contained in all requested pages by embedding a session-ID value in the links just before sending each page to the browser. 只要使用者遵循路徑的連結，可提供站台維護工作階段狀態。Session state is maintained as long as the user follows the path of links that the site provides. 不過，如果使用者代理程式重寫 URL，工作階段狀態執行個體將會遺失。However, if the user agent rewrites a URL, the session-state instance will be lost. 在應用程式名稱後面的斜線之後，任何其餘的檔案或虛擬目錄識別項之前，工作階段識別碼會內嵌在 URL 中。The session ID is embedded in the URL after the slash that follows the application name and before any remaining file or virtual-directory identifier. 這可以讓 ASP.NET 成為解決應用程式名稱之前涉及要求中。This allows ASP.NET to resolve the application name before involving the in the request. 根據預設，無 cookie 工作階段中所使用的工作階段識別碼會循環。By default, session identifiers used in cookieless sessions are recycled. 也就是提出要求時已過期的工作階段 id，如果新的工作階段就會啟動要求所提供的工作階段 id。That is, if a request is made with a session ID that has expired, a new session is started using the session ID supplied with the request. 此行為可能會導致不想要共用工作階段資料包含無 cookie 工作階段識別碼的連結與共用時多個瀏覽器，或許是透過搜尋引擎或其他程式。This behavior can result in the unwanted sharing of session data when a link that contains a cookieless session ID is shared with multiple browsers, perhaps through a search engine or other program. 您可以降低共用多個用戶端藉由停用工作階段識別碼的循環的工作階段資料的可能性。You can reduce the possibility of session data being shared by multiple clients by disabling the recycling of session identifiers. 若要這樣做，請設定`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性的組態項目`true`。To do this, set the `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute of the configuration element to `true`. 這會導致無 cookie 工作階段要求過期的工作階段 id 時產生新的工作階段識別碼This will result in a new session ID being generated when a cookieless session request is made with an expired session ID. 請注意，如果過期的工作階段識別碼所提出之要求使用 HTTP`POST`方法，則任何張貼的資料將會遺失的時機`regenerateExpiredSessionId`是`true`，ASP.NET 會執行重新導向，以確保瀏覽器 URL 中有新的工作階段識別項。Note that if the request made with the expired session ID uses the HTTP `POST` method, then any posted data will be lost when `regenerateExpiredSessionId` is `true`, as ASP.NET performs a redirect to ensure that the browser has the new session identifier in the URL. > [!NOTE] > 而設定`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性設定為`true`減少可能不想要共用的工作階段資料，它無法防止不必要的來源存取另一位使用者的工作階段取得值和請將它加入至伺服器的要求中。While setting the `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute to `true` reduces the possibility of unwanted sharing of session data, it does not protect against an unwanted source gaining access to the session of another user by obtaining the value and including it in requests to the server. 如果您要在工作階段狀態儲存私人或機密資訊，建議您搭配使用 SSL 來加密之間的瀏覽器和伺服器，其中包含的所有通訊。If you are storing private or sensitive information in session state, it is recommended that you use SSL to encrypt any communication between the browser and server that includes the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將`cookieless`設為 true，在 Web.config 檔案中的工作階段屬性。The following code example sets the `cookieless` session attribute to true in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何設定您的伺服器資訊或是工作階段狀態儲存體，請參閱[ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For information about how to configure your server for or session-state storage, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`mode`工作階段屬性Web.config 檔案中。The following code example sets the `mode` session attribute to in the Web.config file. SQL Server 工作階段模式中，`sqlConnectionString`也是必要屬性。For SQL Server session mode, the `sqlConnectionString` attribute is also required. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(string name) cil managed

param.name: name

span.span: Deletes an item from the session-state collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作階段狀態集合沒有包含具有指定的項目`name`，集合會保持不變。If the session-state collection does not contain an element with the specified `name`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會擲回例外狀況。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將值儲存在工作階段狀態中，使用方法。The following example shows how to store values in session state by using the method. 它也會示範如何使用工作階段狀態中移除值方法。It also shows how to remove values in session state by using the method. A控制項用來在網頁上顯示工作階段狀態的內容。A control is used to display the contents of session state on the Web page. 方法用來逐一查看工作階段狀態集合，並填入控制項。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpSessionState#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/HttpSessionStateAddCS.aspx#13)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpSessionState#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/HttpSessionStateAddVB.aspx#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SessionID As String
public: property System::String ^ SessionID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得工作階段的唯一識別項。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier for the session.
The unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來唯一識別伺服器上的工作階段資料的 瀏覽器。The property is used to uniquely identify a browser with session data on the server. 隨機 ASP.NET 產生並儲存在瀏覽器中不會過期工作階段 cookie 值。The value is randomly generated by ASP.NET and stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser. 值，便會與 ASP.NET 應用程式的每個要求的 cookie 中。The value is then sent in a cookie with each request to the ASP.NET application. 如果您想要停用使用 ASP.NET 應用程式中的 cookie，並仍能使用的工作階段狀態，您可以設定您的應用程式的 URL，而非 cookie 中儲存的工作階段識別碼，藉由設定`cookieless`組態的屬性項目`true`，或，在您的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。If you want to disable the use of cookies in your ASP.NET application and still make use of session state, you can configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL instead of a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element to `true`, or to , in the Web.config file for your application. 您可以判斷是否 cookie 支援瀏覽器所指定的值為 ASP.NET針對`cookieless`屬性。You can have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are supported by the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 您也可以讓 ASP.NET 決定是否啟用 cookie 的瀏覽器所指定的值是針對`cookieless`屬性。You can also have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are enabled for the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 如果支援 cookie 時已指定，或已啟用時指定，則工作階段識別碼會儲存在 cookie 中; 否則為將會在 URL 中儲存的工作階段識別碼。If cookies are supported when is specified, or enabled when is specified, then the session identifier will be stored in a cookie; otherwise the session identifier will be stored in the URL. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For more information, see the property. 伺服器與瀏覽器之間傳送純文字，在 cookie 中，或在 URL 中。The is sent between the server and the browser in clear text, either in a cookie or in the URL. 如此一來，不必要的來源無法存取另一位使用者的工作階段取得值並將它加入至伺服器的要求中。As a result, an unwanted source could gain access to the session of another user by obtaining the value and including it in requests to the server. 如果您要在工作階段狀態儲存私人或機密資訊，建議您搭配使用 SSL 來加密之間的瀏覽器和伺服器，其中包含的所有通訊。If you are storing private or sensitive information in session state, it is recommended that you use SSL to encrypt any communication between the browser and server that includes the . 當使用以 cookie 為基礎的工作階段狀態時，ASP.NET 不會配置儲存體的工作階段資料，直到物件使用。When using cookie-based session state, ASP.NET does not allocate storage for session data until the object is used. 如此一來，將新的工作階段識別碼產生的每個頁面要求，直到存取工作階段物件。As a result, a new session ID is generated for each page request until the session object is accessed. 如果您的應用程式需要靜態的工作階段識別碼的整個工作階段，您可以實作`Session_Start`方法，在應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案並將資料儲存在物件來修正工作階段識別碼，或您可以使用程式碼中的另一個組件您的應用程式明確地將資料儲存在物件。If your application requires a static session ID for the entire session, you can either implement the `Session_Start` method in the application's Global.asax file and store data in the object to fix the session ID, or you can use code in another part of your application to explicitly store data in the object. 如果您的應用程式會使用無 cookie 工作階段狀態，工作階段識別碼會在第一個頁面檢視上產生和維護整個工作階段。If your application uses cookieless session state, the session ID is generated on the first page view and is maintained for the entire session. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範設定所要使用無 cookie 工作階段識別碼的工作階段狀態的 Web.config 檔案。The following code example shows a Web.config file that configures session state to use cookieless session identifiers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For more information, see the property. ``` ```

span.span: Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection
public: property System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ StaticObjects { System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得由 ASP.NET 應用程式檔 Global.asax 內 標記所宣告的物件集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects declared by tags within the ASP.NET application file Global.asax.

value.span: ，包含 Global.asax 檔案中所宣告的物件。

span.span: An containing objects declared in the Global.asax file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果頁面上的物件不支援序列化和是跨處理序 (或)，將不會建立物件，並將不會加入至這個集合。If an object on a page does not support serialization and is out-of-process ( or ), the object will not be created and will not be added to this collection. 屬性會提供與舊版 ASP 相容性。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出`id`物件中的物件類型和集合。The following code example lists the `id` and object type of the objects in the collection. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得並設定工作階段狀態提供者終止工作階段之前，要求之間所允許的時間長度 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: Gets and sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

value.span: 逾時週期，以分鐘為單位。

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以設定應用程式使用的 Web.config 檔案中`timeout`屬性的組態項目，或者您可以設定直接使用應用程式程式碼的屬性值。The property can be set in the Web.config file for an application using the `timeout` attribute of the configuration element, or you can set the property value directly using application code. 屬性無法設定的值大於 525,600 分鐘 （1 年）。The property cannot be set to a value greater than 525,600 minutes (1 year). 預設值是 20 分鐘的時間。The default value is 20 minutes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將`timeout`Web.config 檔案中的工作階段屬性設為 30 分鐘。The following code example sets the `timeout` session attribute to 30 minutes in the Web.config file. ``` ```

span.span: Session State Overview
